Bash(cd /n/Agents/HWPX_pythonhwpx && CONDA_NO_PLUGINS=true conda run -n hwpx --no-banner python -c "
from hwpx import HwpxDocument
doc = HwpxDocument.new\(\)
ps = doc.sections[0].properties.page_size
print\(f'A4 default: width={ps.width}, height={ps.height}'\)
print\(f'round\(210*7200/25.4\) = {round\(210*7200/25.4\)}'\)
print\(f'round\(297*7200/25.4\) = {round\(297*7200/25.4\)}'\)
print\(f'exact 210: {210*7200/25.4}'\)
print\(f'exact 297: {297*7200/25.4}'\)
doc.close\(\)
" 2>&1)
